cards.back:
debug

Nghĩa: tìm và sửa lỗi
Example: We need to debug the authentication system before deployment.

deploy

Nghĩa: triển khai
Collocation: deploy application/code
Example: We will deploy the new version tomorrow.

refactor

Nghĩa: tái cấu trúc code
Context: Improving code structure without changing behavior
